channel.title: The New York Times Trends
channel.description: 用中文浏览纽约时报热门报道

item.title: Wolves will regain federal protection across 44 of the lower 48 states after a judge overturned a Trump-era decision that removed them from the Endangered Species List. https://t.co/DbYIpbhXdY

The National Archives and Records Administration discovered what it believed was classified information in documents Donald Trump had taken with him from the White House as he left office, according to a person briefed on the matter. https://t.co/V93byxoOFI

A geomagnetic storm triggered by a recent outburst of the sun destroyed up to 40 new SpaceX satellites.
They are drifting back into Earth’s atmosphere, where they will burn up, potentially costing the company about $100 million. https://t.co/3fa6R8Uj21
Breaking News: Jan. 6 investigators have found gaps in White House phone records during the Capitol riot, when they know Donald Trump was making calls. https://t.co/fmZsm8LVgN

Figure skating in the U.S. is now plainly an Asian American sport.
For the second consecutive Winter Games, four of the six figure skaters representing the U.S. in the singles events are Asian American: Karen Chen, Nathan Chen, Alysa Liu and Vincent Zhou. https://t.co/XxU7wkUxMp https://t.co/aoIznhBw2v

How did Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 become an Olympic champion? Unlike at the 2018 Winter Games, Chen said he wanted to appreciate the Beijing 2022 #Olympics experience, win or lose.
It worked. 🥇 https://t.co/b3nD4rzBS8 https://t.co/kpMMcPIb3R

Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 just took to the ice at #Beijing2022, skating to an Elton John medley of "Rocket Man," "Goodbye Yellow Brick Road," and "Bennie and the Jets."
Follow along live: https://t.co/oHSdyAc2LQ

The moment Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 knew he was an Olympic gold medal winner.
He stood alone at the edge of the #Beijing2022 rink and looked around the arena, seeing those Olympic rings at every turn. https://t.co/kF1LuKcwm4 https://t.co/rDVa79cjgg

Breaking News: Nathan 👏 Chen 👏 The Olympic gold medal is yours. 🇺🇸
Figure skating's “Rocket Man” scored 218.63 with a free skate set to an Elton John medley at #Beijing2022. https://t.co/J6OTCRicgH https://t.co/JuUPzpSfrK

Pierre Elliot Trudeau confronted a violent movement in Quebec in 1970 with the words, “Just watch me.”
Now, some in Canada are calling for his son, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, to channel his forcefulness as the anti-vaccine protests in Ottawa persist. https://t.co/kNSDjT144O

Donovan Carrillo 🇲🇽 trains alongside mostly teenagers in a shopping mall rink in León, Mexico, that is not Olympic size. It took a day to adjust his #Beijing2022 program.
Now he's made Olympic history, and he says you'll see him again in 2026. https://t.co/zyKL9J0rMD https://t.co/CpYrpx7PDD

Birds Aren’t Real, a fake conspiracy movement that aims to fight misinformation with misinformation, has become surprisingly popular.
Has it been successful? Listen to today’s episode of The Daily. https://t.co/qMrMZXJQt6

Breaking News: She did it again. Chloe Kim 🇺🇸 just won another Olympic gold medal.
With a stunning run, she took gold in the #Beijing2022 halfpipe and cemented her snowboarding legacy. https://t.co/tJOBQD4zQZ https://t.co/9cCA27dJfp

“I didn’t want it to end. I wanted to keep skating and living the Olympic dream."
Donovan Carrillo 🇲🇽: the first Mexican ever to qualify for the free skate. #Beijing2022 https://t.co/ge6syvcSs8

Calls for anti-Muslim violence in India have reached a dangerous new pitch, human rights groups are warning.
One well-known extremist has told followers they must "be willing to die" for a Hindu state, pointing to the Taliban and ISIS as a "role model." https://t.co/0efgWSISDf

Lin-Manuel Miranda was nominated for the best original song Oscar for “Dos Oruguitas,” a heart-rending ballad at the emotional climax of “Encanto.” It is the first song he had written from start to finish in Spanish. https://t.co/1YfFGzadRv

Russian troops are massed on the border with Ukraine. Moscow and Washington are exchanging heated words. @peterbakernyt discusses the crisis with @AndrewKramerNYT in Kyiv and @McFaul, a former U.S. ambassador to Russia. Join us now. https://t.co/yoEC0bCm2k https://t.co/0Xa6cHgUUk

Mitch McConnell denounced the RNC on Tuesday for calling the Jan. 6 riot "legitimate political discourse," adding to a small but forceful chorus of Republican lawmakers who have decried the action that the RNC took last week. https://t.co/oSqyLI6HVk
Speaker Nancy Pelosi said she would accept a ban on U.S. lawmakers trading stocks — if it also applies to judges, including Supreme Court justices. https://t.co/zBb7u7F5uM
Breaking News: The House approved the most significant overhaul of the U.S. Postal Service in nearly two decades, aiming to address the agency’s financial woes. https://t.co/b5KyKymzDP

The coronavirus is everywhere in Denmark, yet streets, cafes and shops are full. The country declared that as of Feb. 1, it would no longer consider Covid a “socially critical disease” and dropped all restrictions. https://t.co/sWLnS868CX

Breaking News: Lindsey Jacobellis just won the U.S.'s first gold medal at the #Beijing2022 Olympics. 🥇
She took the gold in snowboard cross. https://t.co/qtgoZwSmkc https://t.co/uieH1TtNqN

René Robert, an 85-year-old photographer, died after falling on a busy street in Paris, apparently ignored for hours by passers-by. Two homeless people, all too familiar with the daily indifferences of bystanders, were the only ones to call for help. https://t.co/63zRuhqZhl

As Canada's capital remained paralyzed by nearly two weeks of protests against pandemic measures, a new road blockade targeting the Ambassador Bridge has effectively cut off the country's busiest link to the U.S. https://t.co/lpstQsV97G https://t.co/vhB0g4Pozo
Open calls for the ethnic cleansing of Muslims in India have moved from the fringes to the mainstream while the government stays silent, analysts say. https://t.co/Y6aV4ulFnA

Russian troops are massed on the border with Ukraine. Moscow and Washington are exchanging heated words. @peterbakernyt discusses the crisis with @andrewkramernyt in Kyiv and @McFaul, a former U.S. ambassador to Russia. Join us on Wednesday at 2 p.m. ET. https://t.co/so2ykTC65x

What a comeback by Shaun White. 🇺🇸
After falling in his first #Beijing2022 Olympics halfpipe run, he landed his second and advanced to the final, flipping his goggles up and waving his arms at the finish. https://t.co/NCaSHXxhSL https://t.co/kvbM4zByfu

Will Smith nabbed a best actor Oscar nomination for “King Richard.” (It is his first nomination since 2007.) Denzel Washington, an eight-time nominee and two-time winner, was recognized for “The Tragedy of Macbeth.”
Here are the nominees for best actor. https://t.co/4TQIOxBOtG https://t.co/V7D2QL3IKO

Jessie Diggins became the first American woman to win an individual Olympic medal in cross-country skiing. She took bronze in the women’s freestyle sprint at #Beijing2022. https://t.co/qU2Qe3RHcD https://t.co/ajWau2xd2u

Mitch McConnell denounced the RNC for calling the Jan. 6 riot “legitimate political discourse” and censuring two of its own members, Representatives Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger. https://t.co/9YXdVdAMmt https://t.co/7uY78AwOOr

Breaking News: Mitch McConnell denounced the RNC for calling the Jan. 6 riot “legitimate political discourse” and censuring two of its own members, Representatives Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger. https://t.co/ZsFBFIJkdX

Eileen Gu soared to victory in the women’s freeski big air competition at #Beijing2022 with a series of gravity-defying tricks.
In her final run, she landed a left double 1620 with a safety grab, a trick she’d never tried before in competition. https://t.co/tUQmy2aSx0 https://t.co/G3y3Oc6aSj

Erik Prince raised money for a venture to use undercover agents to infiltrate opponents of Donald Trump. His involvement sheds new light on how a group of ultraconservative Republicans used spycraft to try to manipulate the American political landscape. https://t.co/jc3TsUxOew

Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called for an end to protests in Canada’s capital, where truckers and anti-vaccine groups have paralyzed the city center. They are “trying to blockade our economy, our democracy and our fellow citizens’ daily lives,” he said. https://t.co/IzFYlbkNQU

Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 is a world record holder.
The figure skating star leapt into first place at #Beijing2022 with an outstanding short program, and set a new world record with his score of 113.97 points. Follow our live Olympics coverage: https://t.co/EtPYxlwuDy https://t.co/qYL8QwpQHc

The 94th Academy Awards nominations were announced this morning. Kristen Stewart received her first nomination.
Here's the full list of nominees for best actress. https://t.co/JcaWFWndZq https://t.co/7eLfHspz23

Beyoncé, already the female artist with the most Grammys, picked up her first Oscar nomination for “Be Alive,” which she wrote with Dixson for “King Richard,” a biopic about the father of Venus and Serena Williams. https://t.co/zKw3s1gW5s https://t.co/Ogs1yjTkhg

Violent anti-Muslim rhetoric has reached a dangerous new pitch in India while the government looks away, rights groups and local activists are warning. They fear that a singular event could ignite widespread violence that would be difficult to contain. https://t.co/JyJ4tl5IQA

A 9.0 megaquake could hit the Pacific Northwest in the next 50 years, and will most likely create waves big enough to wipe out entire towns, scientists say. Evacuation towers may be the only hope, if they ever get built. https://t.co/jvUjL0cQfT https://t.co/2ooDWkwYQ1

Beyoncé has picked up her first Oscar nomination. The power ballad “Be Alive,” which she wrote with the songwriter Dixson for the Venus and Serena Williams biopic “King Richard,” is up for best original song. https://t.co/PkYEmDr1ok

Russian figure skaters have won gold in the #Beijing2022 team figure skating event, led by the 15-year-old phenom Kamila Valieva.
The U.S. won silver, and Japan finished third. https://t.co/VOOkV4TRs9
NBC said the comedian Leslie Jones can continue tweeting about the #Beijing2022 Winter Olympics after she suggested the network was pressuring her to stop. https://t.co/vsf6omEo0y

White-tailed deer in New York have been found carrying the highly transmissible Omicron variant. The results are likely to intensify concerns that deer could become a reservoir for the virus and a potential source of new variants. https://t.co/F0OUAQLKOg

Even before the music stopped in Nathan Chen 🇺🇸’s short program, he knew he'd done it. Four years after mistakes cost him a chance at an Olympic gold medal, he'd done it.
His 113.97 points score has set him up for a shot at #Beijing2022 victory. https://t.co/5SuNlDs7qi https://t.co/BMl25CTiHV

Nailed it. Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 just leaped into first place in the #Beijing2022 figure skating short program.
He scored 113.97 points, punched the air at the finish and put his N95 mask on as soon as he walked off the ice. https://t.co/9QPNoNEk8p

The figure skating world just shook: Yuzuru Hanyu 🇯🇵, the top rival of Nathan Chen 🇺🇸, began his #Beijing2022 short program by popping his first jump. In what was meant to be a quad salchow, he rotated once instead of four times.
Follow live:https://t.co/hzLp4XkbBD

Eileen Gu 🇨🇳: #Beijing2022 Olympic gold medal winner.
Gu, 18, won in the big air competition after landing a third and final run. Follow our live Olympics coverage: https://t.co/P7vzGRo8j8 https://t.co/Uf63Tc02rj

President Vladimir Putin of Russia met with President Emmanuel Macron of France on Monday, in an accelerating push for diplomacy amid mounting Western fears that Russia could attack neighboring Ukraine in the coming weeks. https://t.co/HBlrMld3QT https://t.co/ecBThRs3sF

Donovan Carrillo 🇲🇽 just became the first Mexican man to advance to the figure skating long program. He’s already made history at #Beijing2022, as the first Mexican man to skate at the Olympics in 30 years. https://t.co/uF4zb3Bg2P

Afghanistan has plunged into poverty, with foreign aid frozen by sanctions on the Taliban. Nearly five million Afghans are likely to suffer severe malnutrition this year, the UN says. By one estimate, 90% of hospitals may close in the next few months. https://t.co/SU2Jn6J3dz
